name: Subterranean
description:
Play as a cave explorer who has stumbled upon an ancient grave deep within a cavern.

After deciding to remove an ancient and cursed relic from the tomb, a dark entity emerges to make sure you stay in the caverns forever..

Your goal is to escape to the outside world , surpassing obstacles and cursed beasts in the cave.

Will you escape?

This is part of a school team-based project involving  David Zatopek (@gnashley) , Martin Dao and Dennis Zuniga (@Zuniga.d) with the creation of game and art assets.

audio created by Mike Koenig, Daniel Simion, Man ,BlastwaveFx.com
